For a war-themed recommendation, I suggest "Gone with the Wind" (1936). The epic romance set against the backdrop of the American Civil War offers a blend of historical drama and passionate love story.

If you're interested in a concert film experience, "Rockshow" (N/A) might be suitable. This film captures Paul McCartney's Wings on stage during their iconic World Tour.
